s26-ikigai: Supports Ikigai Gardens by connecting South Carolina churches and volunteers to grow food and combat insecurity.
curiosity: An indie Unreal Engine 5 horror game built by a small Clemson development team.
cantrip: A PyGame adventure where CANRobot escapes a facility after gaining self-awareness.
cpsc-3300-p2: Simulates MIPS instruction execution using a virtual register file and memory model.
cpsc3720.1-s25-team12: Builds and tests API functionality using Postman, YAML, AWS Lambda, and DynamoDB.
3720-learn-git: A class assignment focused on learning GitHub workflows and version control basics.
cyberpunk-game: A two-player 2D Unity puzzle game set in a run-down cyberpunk city.
